snippet: Magnus Carlsen, the world’s top-ranked player, reached a milestone at the London Chess Classic by achieving the highest ranking ever.
abstract: Dylan Loeb McClain Chess column notes that Magnus Carlsen, the world's top-ranked player, reached a milestone at London Chess Classic by achieving highest ranking ever.
lead_paragraph: Magnus Carlsen, the world’s top-ranked player, reached a milestone at the London Chess Classic by achieving the highest ranking ever.

headline.main: Highest-Ever Ranking Is Milestone for Carlsen
